dataItems.Name: Apple Pie
dataItems.description: Made with local granny smith apples to bring you the freshest classic apple pie available.

dataItems.Name: Artichokes with Garlic Aeoli
dataItems.description: Our artichokes are brushed with an olive oil and rosemary blend and then broiled to perfection. Served with a side of creamy garlic aioli.

dataItems.Name: Barbecued Tofu Skewers
dataItems.description: Our barbecued skewers include tofu, cherry tomatoes, bell peppers, and zucchini marinated in a ginger sesame sauce and charbroiled. Served with steamed rice.

dataItems.Name: Café Latte
dataItems.description: Our house blend of espresso and foamed milk. Can be served with flavored syrups and over ice.  Non-dairy substitutions available upon request.

dataItems.Name: Cheesecake
dataItems.description: Our New York Style Cheesecake is rich, smooth, and creamy. Available in various flavors, and with seasonal fruit toppings.

dataItems.Name: Chef's Salad
dataItems.description: The chef’s salad has cucumber, tomatoes, red onions, mushrooms, hard-boiled eggs, cheese, and hot grilled chicken on a bed of romaine lettuce. Served with croutons and your choice of dressing.

dataItems.Name: Chocolate Chip Brownie
dataItems.description: A warm chocolate chip brownie served with chocolate or vanilla ice cream and rich chocolate sauce.

dataItems.Name: Classic Burger
dataItems.description: Our classic burger is made with 100% pure angus beef, served with lettuce, tomatoes, onions, pickles, and cheese of your choice. Veggie burger available upon request. Served with French fries, fresh fruit, or a side salad.

dataItems.Name: Crème Brûlée
dataItems.description: Elegantly crafted creamy vanilla custard with a caramelized crunchy layer on top. Served with seasonal fruit.

dataItems.Name: Fiesta Family Platter
dataItems.description: This platter is perfect for sharing! Enjoy our spicy buffalo wings, traditional nachos, and cheese quesadillas served with freshly made guacamole dip.

dataItems.Name: French Onion Soup
dataItems.description: Caramelized onions slow cooked in a savory broth, topped with sourdough and a provolone cheese blend. Served with sourdough bread.

dataItems.Name: Garden Buffet
dataItems.description: Choose from our fresh local, organically grown ingredients to make a custom salad.

dataItems.Name: Handcrafted Pizza
dataItems.description: Our thin crust pizzas are made fresh daily and topped with your choices of fresh meats, veggies, cheese, and sauce.  Price includes two toppings. Add $1 for each additional topping.

dataItems.Name: House Salad
dataItems.description: Our house salad is made with romaine lettuce and spinach, topped with tomatoes, cucumbers, red onions and carrots. Served with a dressing of your choice.

dataItems.Name: Mini Cheeseburgers
dataItems.description: These mini cheeseburgers are served on a fresh baked pretzel bun with lettuce, tomato, avocado, and your choice of cheese.

dataItems.Name: Mixed Berry Tart
dataItems.description: Raspberries, blueberries, and strawberries on top of a creamy filling served in a crispy tart.

dataItems.Name: Panko Stuffed Mushrooms
dataItems.description: Large mushroom caps are filled a savory cream cheese, bacon and panko breadcrumb stuffing, topped with cheddar cheese.

dataItems.Name: Parmesan Deviled Eggs
dataItems.description:
SOME SAY OUR EGGS ARE DEVILISHLY GOOD. I HAVE TO AGREE.
These delectable little bites are made with organic eggs, fresh Parmesan, and chopped pine nuts."

dataItems.Name: Pomegranate Iced Tea
dataItems.description: Our unique blend of pomegranate juice, black Rubio, and mint tea creates this light fusion of flavors.

dataItems.Name: Quinoa Salmon Salad
dataItems.description: Our quinoa salad is served with quinoa, tomatoes, cucumber, scallions, and smoked salmon. Served with your choice of dressing.

dataItems.Name: Tomato Bruschetta Tortellini
dataItems.description: This classic cheese tortellini is cooked in a sundried tomato sauce. Served with bruschetta topped with a tomato and basil marinara.

dataItems.Name: Tropical Blue Smoothie
dataItems.description: This blueberry mint-based smoothie is refreshing and perfect for any celebration.
